import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-all-employees', templateUrl: './all-employees.component.html', styleUrls: ['./all-employees.component.css'] }) export class AllEmployeesComponent { constructor( private router: Router ) {} addEmployee() { this.router.navigate(['/admin-dashboard/add-employee']); } updateEmployee(){ this.router.navigate(['/admin-dashboard/update-employee']) } }
